events.title: Golf Girl Gazette Spring Classic
events.description: Join us for an exclusive golf experience at the prestigious Pine Valley Golf Club. This event includes a full day of golf, networking, and exclusive access to LPGA professionals.
events.location: Pine Valley Golf Club, New Jersey

events.title: Women's Golf Clinic with LPGA Pros
events.description: Learn from the best! This intensive clinic features instruction from current LPGA Tour professionals, covering all aspects of the game from driving to putting.

events.title: Golf Girl Gazette Championship Weekend
events.description: A weekend-long celebration of women's golf featuring tournament play, workshops, and exclusive networking opportunities with industry leaders.
